Text:
www.bloodtsunami.com

Blood Tsunami has now signed a three album record deal with Nocturnal Art Productions/Candlelight Records, and will enter the studio already in September this year. The debut album is scheduled to hit the streets in February or March 2007, and it will be distributed worldwide by Plastichead Distribution.
